title: BONUS: George Clooney & Julia Roberts: “It’s Like Kissing Your Best Friend”
description: In what Hoda calls one of her favorite interviews ever, she sits down with real life pals George Clooney and Julia Roberts. The two appear together on screen for the sixth time in the new romantic comedy “Ticket to Paradise,” (produced by Universal Pictures, owned by NBC’s parent company NBCUniversal). They touch on parenting twins, their 20-year friendship and the one thing they don’t see eye to eye on. Find out why Hoda calls their friendship pure magic.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (Hoda Kotb, George Clooney, Julia Roberts)
